headline: PPG Industries (NYSE:PPG) Invests US$380 Million In New Aerospace Facility In North Carolina
summary: PPG Industries (NYSE:PPG) recently announced plans to invest $380 million in a new aerospace facility, enhancing its capacity to meet industry demands. This announcement coincides with a 10% rise in the company’s share price over the last month. Meanwhile, the broader market registered a 1% climb, with stock surges following a significant U.S.-UK trade deal announcement. PPG's reaffirmed earnings guidance and recent stock buyback activities likely bolstered investor confidence, complementing...

headline: PPG to invest $380 million to build new U.S. manufacturing facility in Shelby, N.C. for aerospace coatings and sealants
summary: PITTSBURGH, May 08, 2025--PPG to invest $380 million to build new U.S. manufacturing facility in Shelby, N.C. for aerospace coatings and sealants
